text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the fire report being 'sufficient and suitable' is the responsibility of the owner even if completed by a third party. The candidate answer explicitly addresses this under the 'Fire Risk Assessment Compliance' section, stating: 'As responsible person, you remain liable for inadequate assessments' and 'The assessment was inadequate (failed to identify electrical equipment risks)'. This directly confirms the owner's ultimate responsibility for the adequacy of the assessment.", "criterion_id": "96af97b1-4044-42bb-9b71-15102a04a27e"}
